Missing breeds
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: Misc. Q&A (post all new topics here, we'll make more sections later): Missing breeds
By Ruby Wish on Monday, December 31, 2007 - 12:48 pm:

i have 5 breeds left to obtain. What do i say or draw to shrine these:

-Gadgeteer G
-Mushtan
-Kasumi
-Cinderbird
-Ghars

the regen listing on MRM does not have the first three breeds I listed.

also,

Where would i find MFA1 Or MFA2 games? (cheaper the better, perferably free)

By Lisa Shock on Monday, December 31, 2007 - 06:36 pm:

The guide doesn't show drawings to make those monsters, they only have phrases to say for them.

The MFA games show up on ebay occasionally, you might also happen upon them at a place that sells used games, like Gamestop, Game Crazy, etc. I dunno about free.

By Ruby Wish on Monday, December 31, 2007 - 10:04 pm:

what phrases would one say?

By Thorr on Tuesday, January 1, 2008 - 10:32 am:

I have been lax (only because I have been so busy IRL) and haven't posted the whole list yet. I'll try to do it ASAP.

By Thorr on Tuesday, January 1, 2008 - 10:51 am:

Cinderbird can only be made from MFA2.

Ghars can only be made from MFA1.

Phrases -

71 Gadget G - 'Makkinri-' (as in Mt McKinley)
147 Mushtan - 'kiiro' (meaning Amber or just yellow)
139 Kasumi - (long one) 'ichigo no mirufi-yu' (meaning Strawberry Mille-Feuille, a snack cake)

By Ruby Wish on Wednesday, January 2, 2008 - 12:50 pm:

thanks
i know about CB and ghars already. its why i asked where to get MFA1 and 2

you have been very helpful!
